code_value: Questions 1~2  Li Hong lost her suitcase yesterday. She is very depressed. Ask her two questions about it.</br>Questions 3~4  Zhang Ming tells you that he has been accepted by Fudan University. Ask him two questions for more details.
Questions 1~2  Li Hong lost her suitcase yesterday. She is very depressed. Ask her two questions about it.
Questions 3~4  Zhang Ming tells you that he has been accepted by Fudan University. Ask him two questions for more details.
